Did some thinking around this and tried one or two different things, ended up doing this.
Widgets don't seem to keep their apps running in the background (I think you essentially give a list of instructions to the launchers and they create the views that make up the widgets for you), so on app startup, at some point I think the app needs to subscribe BookmarksWidget up to any updates to bookmarks (if such widgets are being used). I've tried to do this in the simplest/minimal way possible.
